name: Space Rampage!
description:
Added 2 new levels

Added Instructions

Added following enemy bases that spawn chasers

Added boss fight (with health bar)

Added asteroid collision

Changed crosshair

Changed some enemy rules

1) stationary shooters can now track player

2) chasers move faster now

Added music changes between levels

Fixed pause menu

Credits

Made by Samuel Mach

Health Bar assets from https://www.youtube.com/c/Brackeys
